system.descriptor: Determining Honesty, motives, personality, or temprament of a person. Noticing small details or characteristics that may pass unseen. For auspex returns, determining A Vessel's mass, velocity, etc.
system.uses: Used to tell if someone is lying, discerning information and conclusions from a complex report, interpreting Augur or Auspx readings and determining what they mean.
